ticket.title: Orchestrator revision loop (1..100 cycles) with deterministic stop conditions

tickets.reason: Prerequisite per RFC-0019 ticket decomposition ordering

in_scope: Implement FAC orchestration state machine in ledger events (iteration counter, budgets, termination reason)
Drive implementer + reviewer episodes iteratively until PASS/BLOCKED/BUDGET_EXHAUSTED/OPERATOR_STOP
Crash-only resumability: restart from ledger head/checkpoint without duplicating projections
Bind each iteration to ChangeSetBundleV1 + reviewer receipts + ledger anchor

criteria: A work_id can run >= 20 revision iterations in integration test without human interaction
Restart resumes orchestration deterministically from ledger state
Termination reasons are recorded as authoritative facts

notes.security: Productivity-first; keep fail-closed invariants intact where already mandated by RFC-0019.
notes.verification: Prefer deterministic tests and CAS/ledger replay checks; avoid relying on process memory.
notes.general: Keep changes minimal, explicit, and reversible; make dependencies and attribution fields queryable.
